availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Jane Jones Hudson on November 25, 1810. Farmer in Wayne County in 1830. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in 1830.

ab.bibl: Fifth Manuscript Census of the United States (1830), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Wayne, unstated, p. 42. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records - Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000591550, Wayne County Marriages, p. 310. Find A Grave, “William Hudson (September 16, 1786-February 28, 1839),” Memorial #67196096, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=67196096 (accessed June 3, 2017).
